title: Tell You Straight
lyrics:
Did you think
Did you think
Did you think for a second I would save you?
You think I wanna fall in love
Did you think for a second I would save you?
You want a life, as a wife
You'd be at home all alone lookin' at the rain
I'm just gonna tell you straight
Baby ima...
Did you think for a second I would save you?
Baby I'ma...
Did you think for a second I would save you?
Baby I'ma...
Save you...
Baby I'ma...
Save you
